title: England's 2003 Rugby World Cup final winners: Where are they now?
text:
With England having defeated the New Zealand All Blacks in the first semi final of the 2019 Rugby World Cup, Telegraph Sport takes a look back at those who secured England's first and only tournament triumph.

Read more: England through to Rugby World Cup final: When is the match, and which team will they play?

Sir Clive Woodward's side were favourites for the 2003 World Cup thanks to a Six Nations grand slam earlier that year, as well as away wins against both Australia and New Zealand in the summer preceding the tournament, but the final had to go to extra-time before they finally got their hands on the trophy.

15. Josh Lewsey
description: With England having defeated the New Zealand All Blacks in the first semi final of the 2019 Rugby World Cup, Telegraph Sport takes a look back at those who secured England's first and only tournament triumph.
